mapper.select: select td.DICTCODE as faultType, nvl(tto.sum,0) as sum from (select * from T_S_DICT where DICTGROUPID = '9b39c007dcde4fa48828a7340fa500e3') td left join (select FAULT_TYPE as fault, count(FAULT_TYPE) as sum from TD_ORDER_TT10086_INFO where ORDER_CREATE_DATE > to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_CREATE_DATE < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_STATUS = 1 group by FAULT_TYPE) tto on td.DICTCODE = tto.fault

select td.NAME as FAULTAREA, nvl(tto.sum,0) as sum from (select * from T_S_DICT where DICTGROUPID in ('0ba28352ce624d43a244cba5c827f2b4','078457f1e9f64c4ebeb7c08c3b66e08c')) td left join (select AREA as area, count(AREA) as sum from TD_ORDER_TT10086_INFO where ORDER_CREATE_DATE > to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_CREATE_DATE < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_STATUS = 1 group by AREA) tto on td.DICTCODE = tto.area

select ORDER_HANDLER as orderHandler,ROUND(avg(HANDLE_MIN)/60,2) as duration from TD_ORDER_TT10086_INFO
ORDER_CREATE_DATE > to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_CREATE_DATE < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_STATUS = 1
and area = #{area}
group by ORDER_HANDLER

select td1.ORDER_HANDLER as orderHandler,round(nvl(td2.success,0)/td1.sum,4)*100 FAULTSUCCESSLV from ( select ORDER_HANDLER, count(*) sum from TD_ORDER_TT10086_INFO
ORDER_CREATE_DATE > to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_CREATE_DATE < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_STATUS = 1
and area = #{area}
group by ORDER_HANDLER) td1 left join ( select ORDER_HANDLER,count(*) success from TD_ORDER_TT10086_INFO
IS_SUCCESS = 1 and ORDER_CREATE_DATE > to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_CREATE_DATE < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_STATUS = 1
and area = #{area}
group by ORDER_HANDLER ) td2 on td1.ORDER_HANDLER = td2.ORDER_HANDLER

SELECT account, sum FROM ( SELECT INTERNET_ACCOUNT AS account, COUNT(*) AS sum FROM TD_ORDER_TT10086_INFO
ORDER_CREATE_DATE > to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_CREATE_DATE < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_STATUS = 1
and area = #{area}
GROUP BY INTERNET_ACCOUNT ) o WHERE o.sum > 1

select td1.ORDER_HANDLER ORDERHANDLER,td1.sum,round(td1.sum/td2.sum,4)*100 FAULTLV from (select ORDER_HANDLER,count(*) sum,AREA from TD_ORDER_TT10086_INFO
ORDER_CREATE_DATE > to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_CREATE_DATE < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_STATUS = 1
and area = #{area}
group by ORDER_HANDLER,AREA) td1 left join (select AREA,count(*) sum from TD_ORDER_TT10086_INFO
ORDER_CREATE_DATE > to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_CREATE_DATE < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ORDER_STATUS = 1
and area = #{area}
group by AREA) td2 on td1.area = td2.area
